Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine orange-pink; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '388'. Name Andronikos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roan Museum, MGR 043.24.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (35)
